ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is certainly in the scriptures of the previous peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is (indicated) in the Books of earlier people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (a revelation embodied) in the scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Its news was also mentioned in the ancient Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed it is mentioned in the earlier Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, it is in the Zubur of the former people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely the same is in the scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Truly it is in the Scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is in the Scriptures of the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, it is foretold in the ancient scriptures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it is in the Scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is indeed [foretold] in the scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Without doubt it is (announced) in the mystic Books of former peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, it (the Quran, and its revelation to Prophet Muhammad SAW) is (announced) in the Scriptures [i.e. the Taurat (Torah) and the Injeel (Gospel)] of former people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Truly, it is in the Books of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is in the scriptures of the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:196] And truly it, the allusion to the Qur’ān [that would be] revealed to Muhammad (s), is in the Scriptures, the Books, of the ancients, such as the Torah and the Gospel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 422 (And lo, it is) i.e. the description of the Qur'an and Muhammad (pbuh) (in the Scriptures of the men of old) is written in the Scriptures of the prophets who came before you.
